creator: vesa.akerman@dans.knaw.nl
text:
When there is a comment in a cell that doesn't have any other contents, reading of comments doesn't work correctly.

I have a test file, where there are comments in two cells.  In the first cell with a comment (let's call it cell A) the CELL-TYPE is STRING, and in the second cell with a comment (let's call it cell B), the CELL-TYPE is BLANK.  

When I read the cell A, I get the comment that is actually in the cell B.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Please upload a test file that demonstrates the problem. Was that file created by POI or Excel? If by POI, please post the code to replicate it too.

Yegor
No update for a long time, therefore closing this as WONTFIX for now.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
